item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 14:06:48 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Women’s Waterproof Shoes

Women’s Waterproof Boots

Men’s Waterproof Shoes

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.75 x 7.6 x 3.4 inches; 1.56 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 29, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Sloggers
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B81XFP8G

Comfort meets trendy, cute and fun.  Sloggers gardening shoes for women provide comfort, support and ease to your feet.  Our soft rubber like material and premium insoles with arch support and extra cushion are the secret to all-day-comfort footwear
Designer Shoes – Each garden clog is built with heavy duty lug tread outsole for great traction and stability.  Soles are made with 90% recycled material.  Perfect pool shoes, river shoes, nursing shoes, our signature tread supports all activities
Aesthetic Womens Clogs – Fit is true to size.  For half sizes order a size up or for a perfect fit try Sloggers half sizer insoles.  Place insole under existing sole to create your half size.  Comfortable for a nurse and durable for camping
Waterproof Shoes – Wet grass, mud, puddles, take it all on.  Our water shoe is easy to rinse off, wipe with a wet cloth and our removable insoles can be washed and air dried.  Definitely add to your garden stuff, beach essentials & lake accessories
Made in USA from US and imported parts.  Our high quality, vegan friendly, odorless, medical grade material contains no latex.  Perfect outdoor garden clogs or beach shoes, but work great as indoor shower shoes as well

Designed with a honeycomb heel section that not only reduces weight, but also adds a spring to your step.

Sloggers clogs, shoes, ankle boots and rain boots come with “All-Day Comfort” premium insoles to keep your feet supported all day.

Sloggers signature deep lug tread provides the same stability and support as a real work boot. Made with 90% recycled material.

Sloggers are easy to care for and clean. Hose them off or wash off in the sink. Remove insole to airdry.
